> Pragmatic insights on dedicated device management, edge AI, and IT operations from Keith Szot, leading evangelism at Esper.io.

This repository mirrors blog posts optimized for AI consumption.

## Content Format

- Each post folder contains: post.md, qa.md, metadata.json
- Posts include Q&A companions for improved AI comprehension
- All content in Markdown with structured metadata
